data.text: Nying maber longʼo moloyo mo mangʼwe ngʼar,
Ber mondo idhi e od kuyo moloyo ot mitimoe nyasi,
Kuyo ber moloyo nyiero,
Ngʼat mariek wiye ok wil gi tho,
Ber mondo ichik iti ne siem ngʼat man-gi rieko,
Nyiero mar ngʼama ofuwo onge tiende
Ka ngʼat mariek mayo ji to obedo ngʼama ofuwo,
Giko mar gimoro ber moloyo chakruokne
Kik ibed ngʼama chwanyore piyo e chunye;
Bende kik ipenjri ni angʼo momiyo ndalo machon gik
Rieko ber mana kaka girkeni, en gima ber
Rieko en tipo
Parane gima Nyasaye osetimo:
Ka gik moko dhini maber, to bed mamor,
E ngima madakie maonge tiendeni asefwenyo
Kik ibed ngʼat mariek ahinya
Kik ibed ngʼama timbene mono ahinya
Kuom mano, e weche ariyogi
Gima rieko nyalo timo ne ngʼato duongʼ
Onge ngʼato kata achiel e piny ngima
Kik ichik iti ni weche ma ji wacho,
nimar in bende ingʼeyo e chunyi
Ne apimo gigo duto gi rieko
Ere kaka dhano difweny rieko?
Omiyo ne aloko pacha
Bangʼe ne ayudo ni
Jayalo wacho niya,
to kane pod anono wechegi,
Gimoro kendo maseyudo en ni
